reviewText:
FIRST PLACE AWARD WINNER: National Council on Family Relations Media Award, Family Violence/Abuse category. HONORABLE MENTION: International Cindy Competition
As a parent I appreciate this valuable topic being handled in such an informative and comforting way. It reinforces things we have talked about at home.  Parent
Dont go into someones house if you don't know them. If someone tries to touch your private body places, tell someone!  Child
The DVD discusses the topic in an understandable way that children can easily grasp. My students learned a great deal from the messages in the songs. All children need to see this.  Elementary School Counselor
